p: The 5 plants were collected in Ngulde district in southern part of Borno State, Nigeria. They had been identified during a previous study [ 8]. Samples of plants collected include root barks of Securidaca longepedunculata, Annona senegalensis, and Carissa edulis and stem barks of Andira inermis subsp. rooseveltii and Parinari polyandra during the dry season.
